game.name: Crabby Beach
game.shortDescription: 게 해변 케니라는 이름의 게 물 에 도착하는 밀렵꾼 및 기타 위협을 피하고,해변 의 위험을 극복 해야하는 흥미로운 차원 플랫 포머 입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Crabby beach - Crab migration season is in full swing! You need to help the main character get to the water, bypassing dangerous obstacles and intrigues of poachers who want to shoot as many crabs as possible!

reviewHighlights.text: Theres's a long list of problems with this game, controls are janky. the artstyle doesn't look good as randomly 8bit sprites, the spikes blend into th...
